usage_notes: Customize each platform's content - don't just copy/paste the same text
Respect character limits: Twitter (280), LinkedIn (3000 but shorter is better), Instagram (2200)
Use platform-appropriate tone: LinkedIn (professional), Instagram (casual), TikTok (authentic)
Include platform-specific features: Twitter threads, LinkedIn carousels, Instagram Reels
Always include clear CTAs: ask questions, prompt saves/shares, drive clicks
Track performance with UTM parameters for links
Add alt text to all images for accessibility
Use hashtags strategically: Twitter (1-3), LinkedIn (3-5), Instagram (up to 30), TikTok (3-5)
Schedule posts at optimal times based on platform analytics
Review and update template based on performance data
